title:
Uniform waist inequalities in codimension two for manifolds with Kazhdan
  fundamental group
abstract:
Let M be a closed Riemannian manifold with Kazhdan fundamental group. It is
well known that the Cheeger inequality yields a uniform waist inequality in
codimension one for the finite covers of M. We show that the finite covers of M
also satisfy a uniform waist inequality in codimension two.
